channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The world's wealthy need to pay up to address the climate crisis, says the top expert behind the Paris Agreement
item.description: Decarbonizing isn't cheap or easy, but the wealthy are responsible for the bulk of the emissions—can we actually hold them accountable?

item.title: 5 things to know before the stock market opens Tuesday
item.description: Here are five key things investors need to know to start the trading day.

item.title: Warren Buffett’s Nebraska grabs top spot in new ranking of state finances
Forget employees. Artificial Intelligence may upend entrepreneurship as we know it
item.description: For every decent idea, a cottage industry of as-good-or-better imitators will emerge almost immediately.

item.title: Hollywood's Jeffrey Katzenberg bets on cybersecurity, avoids digital media as he seeks out startups
item.description: DreamWorks co-founder Jeffrey Katzenberg raised $460 million for his new fund, and is betting on cybersecurity and the future of work, not digital media.

item.title: Latest GameStop stock rally fueled by ‘baseless speculation,’ brokerage CEO says
Traders who scooped up Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway shares at a massive $620,000 discount during ‘glitch’ will have their deals canceled by the NYSE
item.description: In an update posted at 9 p.m. last night NYSE said it would "bust" all the "erroneous" trades of Berkshire Hathaway stock at or below $603,718.30 a share.

item.title: Tuesday's analyst calls: Broadcom a top pick, Chinese EV stock to pop more than 30%
item.description: Broadcom and a Chinese electric vehicle maker were among the stocks being talked by analysts about on Tuesday.

item.title: A ‘pick and mix’ stock market has emerged due to higher interest rates: Goldman
Hedge funds paying for 'literally insane' short on U.K. stocks
item.description: Hedge funds have been caught off guard by sudden valuation jumps as companies eye cheap U.K. stocks.

item.title: Modi's alliance set for narrower-than-expected victory in India's election
item.description: Narendra Modi's Bharatiya Janata Party-led National Democratic Alliance is set to come to power in India again — albeit with a much reduced majority.

item.title: Indian stocks hammered on signs Modi's party may not secure majority
De Beers ditches lab-grown diamonds and shifts focus to natural stones — as it looks beyond mining giant Anglo
item.description: Ending a six-year program that broke one of its oldest taboos.

item.title: China denies Zelenskyy's claim that Beijing is trying to disrupt Ukraine peace summit
item.description: China has denied allegations by Ukraine's president that Beijing is pressuring other countries not to attend an upcoming Ukraine peace summit in Switzerland.

item.title: Investors tempted by meme-stock rally should see these charts before jumping in
